name: Shadow fight 2 Mod
description: Shadow Fight 2 (MOD, Unlimited Money) - a beautiful fighting game for android devices. In this game you can become a master of martial arts and save the world from chaos, but for this you need to go through a difficult path. Learn from other masters new knowledge, use different weapons and armor, study combinations in battles, so in Shadow Fight 2 mod apk you can defeat any opponent.
